variable.name: BCRALIQUOTBARCODE
variable.description: Aliquot of an analyte extracted from a portion of a sample

variable.name: BCRSLIDEBARCODE
variable.description: Slide taken from a portion of a sample

variable.name: PERCENTLYMPHOCYTEINFILTRATION
variable.description: The percentage of infiltration by lymphocytes in a tumor sample

variable.name: PERCENTNECROSIS
variable.description: The percentage of cell death in a malignant tumor sample

variable.name: PERCENTNORMALCELLS
variable.description: The percentage of normal cell content in a malignant tumor sample

variable.name: PERCENTSTROMALCELLS
variable.description: The percentage of reactive cells that are present in a malignant tumor sample or specimen but are not malignant such as fibroblasts, vascular structures, etc

variable.name: PERCENTTUMORCELLS
variable.description: The percentage of malignant cell tumor nuclei content in a tumor sample

variable.name: PERCENTTUMORNUCLEI
variable.description: The percentage of tumor nuclei in a malignant neoplasm sample
